structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.text:
Any active member of the Kentucky National Guard who is not a Kentucky resident shall qualify for the tuition award benefits provided by KRS 164.516 to 164.5169 subject to the following conditions:
The member enrolls in an educational institution within this state; and
The tuition award benefits provided to the out-of-state member shall not exceed an amount equivalent to the in-state tuition amount the member would have received if the member were a Kentucky resident.
law.history: Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 220, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1996.
